titleStmt.title: The treacherous brothers a tragedy, as it is acted by Their Majesty's servants at the Theatre-royal / written by George Powell.
titleStmt.author: Powell, George, 1658?-1714.
Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657? Herba parietis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Blackwell ... and sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
The main incident is taken from Bayly's "Herba parietis, or, The wallflower."
"Epilogue. Writ by Mr. Mountfort, spoken by Mrs. Butler in mans apparel": p. [1] at end.
